dashboard.title: Legalisation page
dashboard.description: Apostille legalization: We are often required to present documents in other countries to different organizations such as a company, a school or an authority. These countries require guarantees as to the authenticity and conformity of these documents. Authentication of signatures and stamps necessarily involves:
dashboard.apostille: Apostille: a formality called apostille (in the case of countries that are part of the Hague Convention).
dashboard.legalisation: Legalization: another procedure with the Minister of Foreign Affairs and then with the consular services of the embassies of the countries receiving the documents.
dashboard.legalisation_apostille: Apostille legalization: an exemption from any apostille legalization process.
